bioAsHtml:
Erik-Berndt has worked on assignments for various customers of Sogeti Nederland BV, both in-house and at customer locations.

Having more than 8 years of Java enterprise experience, Erik-Berndt is well versed in all standard technologies of Java EE software development. This includes JSF, JPA, Hibernate, EJB 3.x and various Spring frameworks. In his spare time he once contributed to Hibernate Envers, which can be used to record audit trails of database changes.

acceptedTalks.title: Integration testing with Maven, Arquillian and Docker Maven plugins
